data.eml:eml: Pheidole protaxi sp. nov. (Hymenoptera: Formicidae), new species from tabuleiro forests of the Atlantic Forest biome

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article ML Oliveira, CSF Mariano, MA Costa, JHC Delabie, S Lacau (2015): Pheidole protaxi sp. nov. (Hymenoptera: Formicidae), new species from tabuleiro forests of the Atlantic Forest biome. Sociobiology 62 (4): 533-537, DOI: 10.13102/sociobiology.v62i4.866
